title: kANbedeppOden ayyanE
sahitya:
kANbadeppOden ayyanE unnaik-kaNkuLira nAn en kali tIravE


anupallavi

  mANbuDan en manak-kOvilil vaittuanip-paN pADi nALum koNDADiDum nAn


caraNam    kapitanukkirangi Or kapitanai vadaittAi abhayamen-raDainda Or arakkanaik-kAttAi
 upacAram ariyEn shiriyEn shei pala apacAram poruttu AtkoNDa unranai
